video.title: Expedition Unknown
video.synopsis: A fearless archaeologist leaves no stone unturned in his quest to uncover the truth about some of the world's most famous myths and legends.

episodes.synopsis: Deep in the jungles of Cambodia, Josh explores the ruins of an ancient lost city and searches for a stone said to have mystical powers.
episodes.title: Temple of Doom

episodes.synopsis: On the trail of the most valuable object ever stolen, the Amber Chamber, Josh visits a stunning replica and descends into abandoned Nazi bunkers.
episodes.title: World's 8th Wonder

episodes.synopsis: As Josh saddles up to seek the legendary lost treasure of Jesse James, he turns to experts and high-tech tools for help separating fact from fiction.
episodes.title: The Legend of Jesse James

episodes.synopsis: Josh explores the ruins of Machu Picchu and treks high into the Andes in search of another Incan city rumored to be rich in gold and jewels.
episodes.title: City of Gold

episodes.synopsis: To unlock the secrets of a fabled crystal the Vikings may have used to conquer the seas, Josh visits a shipwreck, a crypt and an old Norwegian mine.
episodes.title: Viking Sunstone

episodes.synopsis: Diving into a reef off Panama's coast, Josh joins a team sifting through shipwrecks in search of Capt. Henry Morgan's treasure-laden flagship.
episodes.title: Captain Morgan's Lost Gold

episodes.synopsis: Josh tries to crack the mystery of the multimillion-dollar Thomas Beale treasure and the three encoded documents said to contain its location.
episodes.title: Code to Gold

episodes.synopsis: To unravel the baffling collapse of the Mayan empire, Josh explores underground caverns and pores over offerings left at sacrificial altars.
episodes.title: Mayan Apocalypse

episodes.synopsis: Josh travels to Papua New Guinea and Fiji to hunt down clues to one of the 20th century's most vexing mysteries: the disappearance of Amelia Earhart.
episodes.title: Amelia Earhart

episodes.synopsis: Is it an ancient calendar or alien memento? Josh heads to Peru to uncover the true meaning of huge symbols etched into the desert by the Nazca tribes.
episodes.title: Secrets of the Nazca

episodes.synopsis: Josh awakens his inner samurai as he explores Japan's shrines and tunnels, searching for a legendary sword that vanished after World War II.
episodes.title: Samurai Sword of Power

episodes.synopsis: In Myanmar, Josh dives into treacherous waters to search for an enormous golden bell that was stolen by a warlord, then lost in a murky river.
episodes.title: Curse of the Golden Bell
